location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary, Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Assistant in Charge of the Residency, Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter acknowledges the receipt of Bruce's letter, dated 17 January 1811, which reported the arrival of a French emissary at Sherazz [Shiraz]. Warden conveys the Governor in Council's approval regarding Bruce's vigilance in tracing the emissary's progress and reporting his acts.
